SpellChargeTime.Description: The time it takes to charge the spell, to then be able to activate it.

SpellActivationTime.Description: The time it takes to activate the flight of the damned power. Basically the time between when the player presseing the activation confirm button and when the skeletons are summoned on screen.

Cooldown_ChargeThresholdInSeconds.Description: The threshold in seconds for the charge to reach for any cooldown to be triggered. (to prevent punishing players when tapping the ability button)

Cooldown_IntroCooldown.Description: The cooldown that is applied at the start of the match, after the intro sequence is completed

Cooldown_ActivatedSpell.Description: The cooldown that is applied on the spell if the spell is cast.

Cooldown_CancelledSpell.Description: The cooldown that is applied on the spell if the spell was cancelled (i.e. charge has been started but spell was not confirmed to be cast)

ExitInteractionTime_ActivatedSpell.Description: The time it takes to exit the interaction when the spell is cast.

ExitInteractionTime_CancelledSpell.Description: The time it takes to exit the interaction when the spell is cancelled (not cast).

SpectralEntities_Angle.Description: The angle range at which the spectral entities will spawn. Each entity spawned will be at an equal rotation angle difference

SpectralEntities_DistanceOffsetFromKille.Description: The distance (in cm) to spawn in front of the killer

SpectralEntities_NumberOfEntitiesToSpawn.Description: The number of spectral entities to spawn.

SpectralEntities_TrajectoryPreviewLength.Description: The length that will be shown on the trajectory preview

SpectralEntities_TrajectoryPreviewWidth.Description: The width that will be shown on the trajectory preview

SpectralEntities_TrajectoryPreviewHeight.Description: The height offset that will be added to the trajectory previewer.

SpectralEntities_SurvivorDefaultMaximumA.Description: The maximum distance (in cm) survivors are able to see the aura of the Spectral Entities

SpectralEntities_KillerInstinctLifetimeO.Description: The time killer instinct stays on a survivor if downed by a spectral entity

SpectralEntities_SummoningTime.Description: The time it takes for the spectral entities to summon (i.e. go from the inactive state to the active state)

SpectralEntities_DespawnTime.Description: The time it takes for spectral entities to despawn.

SpectralEntities_MaximumMovementSpeed.Description: The maximum movement speed (cm/s) the spectral entities can reach

SpectralEntities_MaximumTravelDistance.Description: The maximum distance the spectral entities can travel before despawning

SpectralEntities_Height.Description: The height at which the spectral entities are located.

Counter_RevealKillerDuration.Description: The time the killer is revealed to the survivor when activating the FOTD spell

Addon_01_MaximumTravelDistanceAdditive.Description: The number of units (in cm) added to the maximum travel distance of the spectral entities

Addon_05_SpectralEntities_NearMiss_AuraR.Description: The time the killer instinct will stay on a survivor during a near miss

Addon_10_SpectralEntitiesPopulationModif.Description: The additional number of spectral entities that will be added

Addon_10_SpectralEntitiesAngleModifierAd.Description: The angle increase between each spectral entities when the killer has Addon 10 equipped

Addon_20_SpectralEntitiesPopulationModif.Description: The additional (in this case a negative number is expected) number of spectral entities that will be added

Addon_20_SpectralEntitiesHeightModifierA.Description: The height added to the spectral entity (to their mesh and collision)

Addon_20_SpectralEntitiesAngleModifierAd.Description: The angle increase between each spectral entities when the killer has Addon 19 equipped
